name: This is the Only Level 3
summary:
Just when you thought you completed the level, it's going to happen all
over again... master 30 new permutations of a brand new level from the
minds of Tasselfoot and the programming claws of Jmtb02! Now featuring
artwork from Jimp, the game is a brand new challenge... do you have what
it takes to complete the level? Switch the switch! Poop some pastries!
And think outside the box... you'll need it to survive!
